abstract: sonic earns hold rating from canaccord genuity .
article: sonic 's stock had its `` hold '' rating reiterated by research analysts at canaccord genuity in a report issued on friday . they currently have a $ 30.00 price target on the restaurant operator 's stock . canaccord genuity 's price target suggests a potential upside of 7.03 % from the company 's current price . a number of other analysts have also recently commented on sonc . zacks investment research raised sonic from a `` sell '' rating to a `` buy '' rating and set a $ 26.00 price target for the company in a research report on wednesday , september 13th .

citigroup started coverage on sonic in a research report on monday , september 18th . they set a `` buy '' rating and a $ 28.00 price target for the company . oppenheimer reaffirmed a `` buy '' rating and set a $ 29.00 price target on shares of sonic in a research report on friday , october 6th . finally , cowen reaffirmed a `` neutral '' rating on shares of sonic in a research report on tuesday , october 17th . one equities research analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating , nine have given a hold rating and five have assigned a buy rating to the stock .

sonic currently has an average rating of `` hold '' and a consensus price target of $ 28.86 . shares of sonic opened at $ 28.03 on friday . sonic has a 52-week low of $ 22.11 and a 52-week high of $ 30.05 . the company has a debt-to-equity ratio of -3.19 , a quick ratio of 1.48 and a current ratio of 1.52 . the company has a market capitalization of $ 1,076.72 , a pe ratio of 18.94 , a price-to-earnings-growth ratio of 1.41 and a beta of 1.74 . sonic last issued its quarterly earnings results on thursday , january 4th .

the restaurant operator reported $ 0.30 eps for the quarter , topping the zacks ' consensus estimate of $ 0.25 by $ 0.05 . sonic had a negative return on equity of 31.39 % and a net margin of 13.68 % . the company had revenue of $ 105.40 million during the quarter , compared to analysts ' expectations of $ 106.86 million . during the same quarter in the previous year , the firm posted $ 0.24 eps . the firm 's revenue was down 18.7 % compared to the same quarter last year . equities analysts forecast that sonic will post 1.34 earnings per share for the current year .
